Badges

Badges are achievements that are unlocked by completing certain challenges or milestones in the game. They provide permanent benefits and recognition for accomplishments.

Badge Categories

* Hero Badges: Related to hero classes and subclasses * Item Badges: Related to finding special items * Mastery Badges: Related to mastering subclasses * Challenge Badges: Related to completing challenges * Achievement Badges: General achievements

Common Badges

* Badge: Defeat Spider Queen * Badge: Heal Gnoll Brute

Unlock Requirements

Some badges have specific requirements for unlocking hero classes: * Huntress: Defeat 3rd boss (DM300) OR donate 1+ * Elf: Defeat 4th boss (The King) OR donate 2+ * Gnoll: Heal Gnoll Brute at town priest OR donate 3+

Mechanics

Badges are stored in the player's profile and persist across games. Some badges unlock additional content or provide minor gameplay benefits.
